title: David Lean: a self portrait
creator_contributor_role: Thomas Craven Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Bolt, Robert, 1924-
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Excerpts
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Lean, David, 1908-
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - History
description: A comprehensive documentary made in collaboration with the noted director at work on the set, on location, and in the editing room, as he explains his viewpoint about the film and his method of work. Illustrates with excerpt from several of Lean's films, which together have won a number of awards. Includes interviews with Sam Spiegel who produced some of Lean's early films and Robert Bolt who wrote the scripts for Lean's last three films.
